select jsh_depot_item.header_id, group_concat(concat(jsh_material.name,' ',ifnull(jsh_material.standard,''),' ',ifnull(jsh_material.model,''))) as materialsList from jsh_depot_item left join jsh_material on jsh_depot_item.material_id = jsh_material.Id and ifnull(jsh_material.delete_Flag,'0') !='1' where 1=1
and jsh_depot_item.header_id in
#{item}
and ifnull(jsh_depot_item.delete_flag,'0') !='1' group by jsh_depot_item.header_id

select header_id, sum(oper_number) materialCount from jsh_depot_item where 1=1
and header_id in
#{item}
and ifnull(delete_flag,'0') !='1' group by header_id

select dh.link_number number, ifnull(sum(dh.deposit),0) finishDeposit from jsh_depot_head dh where 1=1
and dh.link_number in
#{item}
and ifnull(dh.delete_flag,'0') !='1' group by dh.link_number
